Package fr.iutvalence.info.but.s2_01.jrava.model

Class ActivityFilter

java.lang.Object
fr.iutvalence.info.but.s2_01.jrava.model.ActivityFilter
public class ActivityFilter extends Object
Activity filter, initialized with an activity list, and allowing to filter this list by type, year (current), month (current).
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sebastien Jean

    • filterByCurrentYear

      public Map<Integer,Activity> filterByCurrentYear()
      Filters activities to retain those of current year.
      Returns:
      only activities dated by current year

    • filterByCurrentMonth

      public Map<Integer,Activity> filterByCurrentMonth()
      Filters activities to retain those of current month.
      Returns:
      a list containing only activities dated by current month

    • isCurrentYear

      private boolean isCurrentYear(Calendar date)
      Checks if a given year matches current one.
      Parameters:
      date - date to check
      Returns:
      true if year is current one, false else

      Returns:
